import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket description"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/description"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the issue description text for a ticket. This modifies the detailed description field without affecting other ticket properties.

**Behavior**
- Replaces the existing `IssueDescription` with the new text
- Does not trigger workflow rules or status changes
- Records the change in ticket activity history

**Use Cases**
- Adding additional details after initial ticket creation
- Correcting or clarifying the original issue description
- Appending diagnostic information gathered during troubleshooting

**Prerequisites**
- Obtain ticket ID via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets)
- Caller must have permission to work on the ticket

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket to update","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated description payload","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating a ticket's description text.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket to update. Should match the TicketId in the URL path.","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"New description text for the ticket. This will replace the existing IssueDescription.","example":"Updated description: Device screen cracked after being dropped. Screen is not responding to touch."}},"example":{"TicketId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","Description":"Updated description: Device screen cracked after being dropped."},"title":"UpdateTicketDescriptionRequest"},"example":{"TicketId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","Description":"Updated description: Device screen cracked after being dropped."}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
